title: Medical Practice Competency Enhancement: Instructional Design Scenarios for Pediatric Pharmacy Advanced Electives

context.prior_knowledge: Basic pharmaceutical knowledge (pediatric medicine fundamentals, pharmacokinetics/pharmacodynamics theory, clinical practice experience)
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Design personalized medication therapies for individual pediatric patients.
Establish strategies for managing drug interactions and side effects in pediatric clinical scenarios.
Analyze the latest research trends in pediatric pharmacology and incorporate them into academic reports.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
